name: Agrofarm
description:
AgroFarm differs from other NFT games in that it has a non-house-centric algorithm.
In other words, it's not like a casino where the house always wins. It is designed exclusively for the community and without advances by the entire Agro matrix.

In this way, players will not only be rewarded for their skills, but will also earn extra rewards directly from the platform's total profits. To make it even better, another part will go directly to the purchase of burning xAGC tokens. You can then have fun, enter the profitable world of NFT games and who knows, be one of the top 3 players of the week who will share part of the fees!
